name: 莱斯利·廖

last_movies.title: 保证好笑：单口喜剧新人王
瑞恩·汉森破案秀 第一季

introduction: Leslie Liao is a writer, performer, and stand-up comedian using the stage to reflect on her experience as a single Chinese-American female living in Los Angeles. She was recently named a 2023 JFL New Face, placed first in Bert's Back Room's LA's Top Comic Competition, and was a finalist in the Crazy Woke Asians comedy festival. She's worked on productions for E! with Anjelah Johnson (Not Fancy), Lauren Ash (NBC's Superstore), and Punkie Johnson (SNL), as well as studio films such as Central Intelligence, Office Christmas Party, and YouTube Red’s Ryan Hansen Solves Crimes on Television. Her comedy has graced the stages of The Comedy Store, Laugh Factory, Hollywood Improv, Flappers, Westside Comedy Theater, HaHa Comedy Club, a random hotel she's pretty sure is haunted, and many more.Leslie Liao (中文名未知) 是一位作家、表演者和单口喜剧演员，她善于在舞台上讲述，调侃自己作为单身华裔美国女性，在洛杉矶的的生活约会相亲经历。 她最近被评为JFL 2023 年新面孔，在 Bert's Back Room 举办的洛杉矶顶级喜剧大赛中获得第一名，并入围 Crazy Woke Asians (疯狂觉醒的亚洲人) 喜剧节决赛。 她曾参与《E!》的制作工作，与安杰拉·约翰逊（《Not Fancy》）、劳伦·阿什（NBC 的 Superstore）和庞基·约翰逊（SNL）合作，以及工作室电影，如《中央情报局》、《办公室圣诞派对》和 YouTube Red 的瑞安·汉森在电视上破案。 她的喜剧曾在 The Comedy Store、Laugh Factory、Hollywood Improv、Flappers、Westside Comedy Theatre、HaHa Comedy Club等舞台上亮相。
